item.title: M-cap of seven of India's most-valued firms gains  ₹1 lakh crore; RIL, Bajaj Finance biggest gainers

review.headline_rewrite: M-cap of seven of India's most-valued firms gains  ₹1 lakh crore; RIL, Bajaj Finance biggest gainers
bullets: The upturn was a result of a bullish trend in the equity market, with the BSE benchmark Sensex jumping 901.11 points, or 1.12%, and
the companies that gained last week are: Even though some companies gained, others also saw losses.
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys and Hindustan Unilever (HUL) faced losses during the week.

item.title: Possible shortfall in nominal GDP growth in FY26 due to benign inflation: CEA Nageswaran

review.headline_rewrite: Possible shortfall in nominal GDP growth in FY26 due to benign inflation: CEA Nageswaran
bullets: Given the expectation of benign inflation, there may be a shortfall in nominal GDP growth compared to the Budget estimate of 10.1 per cent
He expressed optimism about meeting the real GDP growth target of 6.3-6.8 per cent for the current fiscal year despite the US imposing a
Nominal GDP includes changes in prices caused by inflation, reflecting the impact of rising overall price levels, while real GDP is an inflation-adjusted measure
Inflation is expected to be low on account of an estimated good kharif harvest and a reduction in prices of around 400 items after

item.title: Food delivery likely to get costlier on platform fee hike, GST levy

review.headline_rewrite: Food delivery likely to get costlier on platform fee hike, GST levy
bullets: The hike in platform fees by Zomato, Swiggy and magicpin ahead of the festive season is set to make ordering food costlier for millions
Rival Zomato has raised its platform fee to ₹12.50 (excluding GST), whereas the third-largest food delivery player, magicpin, has also revised its platform fee
Estimates suggest that the additional burden on account of 18 per cent GST to be levied on delivery charges from September 22 is expected
E-mail queries sent to Swiggy and Zomato by PTI seeking responses remained unanswered.
